1ee8fd21-7f42-46b8-811d-a07761ba8502.name: 特化
1ee8fd21-7f42-46b8-811d-a07761ba8502.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

490240a8-9f7b-4f39-8e05-b07562735a0b.name: 特化
490240a8-9f7b-4f39-8e05-b07562735a0b.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

4a8bc518-6286-425b-8474-a5f678e72426.name: 特化
4a8bc518-6286-425b-8474-a5f678e72426.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

2eed7dcc-6d62-4f24-9d3d-dc7e3bdfb01a.name: 健康
2eed7dcc-6d62-4f24-9d3d-dc7e3bdfb01a.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

dee751df-47ea-4657-90f8-45214ac5eaf8.name: Fit, Very
dee751df-47ea-4657-90f8-45214ac5eaf8.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

3ff110b3-67b0-47e6-ab3f-12aca2204038.name: 高痛阈
3ff110b3-67b0-47e6-ab3f-12aca2204038.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

d4d2fafc-cd1d-41e5-ab22-cada0c159120.name: 特化
d4d2fafc-cd1d-41e5-ab22-cada0c159120.notes: @小型子集：常绿植物、药用植物@

dc41b7c1-7b9f-4dca-9aab-247c97ec68a4.name: 可选增益
dc41b7c1-7b9f-4dca-9aab-247c97ec68a4.notes: 你照料的植物为了生存进行的检定有加值。

2781a313-d543-4994-8a6a-58a847bf2bb1.name: 期待陪伴
2781a313-d543-4994-8a6a-58a847bf2bb1.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

bca5366f-e8d0-434b-9995-8ba9bbd765b9.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
bca5366f-e8d0-434b-9995-8ba9bbd765b9.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

8ad32ba0-27ae-4f9f-9797-fd8c996122dc.name: 邪恶双生子
8ad32ba0-27ae-4f9f-9797-fd8c996122dc.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大或拥有你没有的能力

e99901b4-a38d-46f5-bed4-210f5bc88d64.name: 邪恶双生子
e99901b4-a38d-46f5-bed4-210f5bc88d64.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大且拥有你没有的能力

58697614-b812-4728-9e43-c7f6fb176a57.name: Secret (@Low brth, runaway serf, or other@)

b12db6db-2a79-4272-817b-4744af4f28db.name: 地域知识
b12db6db-2a79-4272-817b-4744af4f28db.notes: 几百亩之内的居民、痕迹、溪流、隐蔽地点、埋伏处、植物群和动物群
